title: Connect more profiles
description: Be able to connect up to 25 Overwatch profiles to your Discord ID.

title: SRs performance graph1
description: Unlock the 'profile graph' command to see your SRs performance wrapped in a graph.

title: Newsboard2
description: Set up a channel to receive the latest Overwatch news.

title: Custom embeds color
description: Customize most of the embeds by changing their color.

title: Discord role3
description: Get access to the Premium role on OverBot's official Discord server.
